name: Matthew Trevino
summary: Highly skilled Systems Architect and Operations Professional with 15+ years of experience in Logistics Management and IT Automation, possessing a unique blend of technical and business acumen.

achievements: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium, reducing manual administrative time by 40%
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive driver and route data
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments
Designed and implemented a custom scheduling system, reducing downtime by 30% and improving fleet utilization

education.degree: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
